info.name: Billbook Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete collection for all Billbook Backend APIs including Authentication, Stores, Store Users, Shifts, Special Shifts, Staff Management with Banking Details, Staff Payments with Breakdown, and File Upload

item.name: Authentication APIs

request.description: Register a new user. Returns temporary token for OTP verification.
Verify OTP sent during registration.
Set password to complete registration after OTP verification.
Login with phone and password. Token is automatically saved.
Send OTP for password-less login.
Verify OTP for password-less login.
Send OTP for password reset.
Reset password with current password verification.
Get authenticated user's profile information.
Resend OTP for registration, login, or password reset. Attempts parameter tracks retry count.
General OTP verification endpoint for various flows.
Enable multi-factor authentication for the user.
Set password (standalone endpoint, different from registration flow).
Logout from current session.
Logout from all sessions.

item.description: Complete user authentication and account management APIs - 15 endpoints

item.name: Store Management

body.raw:
{
  "name": "My Awesome Store",
  "mobile_no": "+1234567890",
  "whatsapp_no": "+1234567890",
  "contact_email_id": "store@example.com",
  "reporting_email_id": "reports@example.com",
  "gst_number": "22AAAAA0000A1Z5",
  "tax_billing": true,
  "business_category": "Retail",
  "instagram_link": "https://instagram.com/mystore",
  "facebook_link": "https://facebook.com/mystore",
  "google_maps_link": "https://maps.google.com/?q=mystore",
  "address_line_1": "123 Main Street",
  "locality": "Downtown",
  "city": "New York",
  "state": "NY",
  "country": "USA",
  "pincode": "10001",
  "latitude": 40.7128,
  "longitude": -74.0060
}

request.description: Create a new store. Creator becomes owner automatically.
Get all stores user has access to with pagination.
Get details of a specific store.
Update store details. Only owners and managers can update.
Upload a logo for the store. Only owners and managers can upload. Accepts image files (jpeg, png, gif) up to 5MB.
Get the store's logo image file. User must have access to the store.

item.description: Store creation, management, and information retrieval APIs

item.name: Store User Management

request.description: Add a user to store with specific role (owner, manager, employee, member).
Get all users associated with a store with optional role filtering.
Update a user's role in the store.
Remove a user from the store.

item.description: APIs for managing users within stores and their roles

item.name: Regular Shifts Management

request.description: Create a regular weekly shift for a specific day.
Create a 24-hour shift for a specific day.
Create a closed day shift using the is_closed field.
Get all weekly shifts for a store, ordered by day.
Get details of a specific shift by its ID.
Update shift details.
Update a shift to be 24 hours open.
Update a shift to be closed (store closed on this day).
Delete a shift.
Create multiple shifts for different days of the week in a single request. Perfect for setting up complete weekly schedule.
Get store availability (opening/closing times) for a specific date. Checks special shifts first, then regular weekly shifts.

query.description: Regular Friday - will use weekly shift schedule

request.description: Get store availability for a regular day (no special shift defined). Will return regular weekly shift information.

item.name: Get Store Availability - No Shift Defined

query.description: Sunday - if no shift defined, store is closed

request.description: Get store availability when no shift is defined for the day. Store will be marked as closed.

item.description: APIs for managing regular weekly store operating hours

item.name: Special Shifts Management

request.description: Create special operating hours for a specific date.

body.raw:
{
  "date": "2025-01-01",
  "name": "New Year's Day",
  "opening_time": null,
  "closing_time": null,
  "is_24_hours_open": false,
  "is_closed": true
}

request.description: Create a special closed day using the is_closed field.

body.raw:
{
  "date": "2025-12-31",
  "name": "New Year's Eve",
  "opening_time": null,
  "closing_time": null,
  "is_24_hours_open": true,
  "is_closed": false
}

request.description: Create a 24-hour special shift for a specific date.
Get all special shifts for a store with pagination.

item.name: Get Special Shifts with Date Filter

request.description: Get special shifts filtered by date range.
Get details of a specific special shift by its ID.
Update special shift details.
Update both the date and hours of a special shift.
Update a special shift to be closed (store closed on this specific date).
Delete a special shift.
Create multiple special shifts for different dates in a single request. Perfect for setting up holiday hours and special events.

item.description: APIs for managing special date-specific store operating hours

item.name: Receipt Settings Management

request.description: Get receipt customization settings for a store. Returns default settings if none are configured.

body.raw:
{
  "logo": true,
  "gst_no": true,
  "staff_name": false,
  "loyalty_points": true,
  "wallet_balance": false,
  "payment_method": true,
  "date_time": true,
  "customer_contact": true,
  "discount": true,
  "notes": [
    "Thank you for shopping with us!",
    "All sales are final",
    "Visit us again for more deals!"
  ],
  "phone_numbers": "+1234567890,+0987654321,+1122334455"
}

request.description: Create new receipt settings or update all settings if they already exist.
Partially update existing receipt settings. Only provided fields will be updated.

body.raw:
{
  "logo": true,
  "gst_no": true,
  "staff_name": true,
  "loyalty_points": true,
  "wallet_balance": true,
  "payment_method": true,
  "date_time": true,
  "customer_contact": true,
  "discount": true,
  "notes": [
    "Premium Receipt",
    "Complete transaction details included",
    "Keep this receipt for warranty claims"
  ]
}

request.description: Enable all receipt features for comprehensive receipt printing.

body.raw:
{
  "logo": false,
  "gst_no": false,
  "staff_name": false,
  "loyalty_points": false,
  "wallet_balance": false,
  "payment_method": true,
  "date_time": true,
  "customer_contact": false,
  "discount": false,
  "notes": [
    "Simple receipt",
    "Thank you!"
  ]
}

request.description: Create minimal receipt settings with only essential information.
Delete custom receipt settings and revert to default settings. Only store owners can perform this action.

item.description: APIs for managing receipt customization and printing settings

item.name: Products Management

request.description: Retrieve all products for a specific store with pagination, search, and filtering options.
Retrieve details of a specific product by store ID and product ID.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Premium Coffee Beans",
  "company": "Coffee Co.",
  "cost_price": 25.50,
  "selling_price": 35.00,
  "usage": "Beverage",
  "category": "Food & Beverages",
  "qty": 100,
  "prod_qty": 500,
  "prod_qty_unit": "grams",
  "mfg_date": "2024-01-15",
  "exp_date": "2025-01-15",
  "notification_qty": 10,
  "expiry_notification_days": 30,
  "hsn_sac_code": "09011100",
  "tax_prcnt": 18.00,
  "description": "Premium arabica coffee beans sourced from Brazil",
  "batch_no": "CF2024001"
}

request.description: Create a new product in the specified store. All users with store access can create products.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Premium Coffee Beans - Updated",
  "selling_price": 38.00,
  "qty": 85,
  "description": "Premium arabica coffee beans sourced from Brazil - Updated description",
  "notification_qty": 15
}

request.description: Update an existing product. Only the fields provided in the request body will be updated.
Decrease the quantity of a specific product. Quantity will not go below 0. Useful for sales or inventory adjustments.
Increase the quantity of a specific product. Useful for restocking or inventory adjustments.
Delete a specific product. Only store owners and managers can delete products.

item.description: APIs for managing product inventory, including CRUD operations and quantity management

item.name: Services Management

request.description: Retrieve all services for a specific store with pagination, search, and filtering options.
Retrieve details of a specific service including product usage information.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Premium Hair Treatment",
  "reminder": null,
  "category": "Hair Care",
  "description": "Professional hair treatment with premium products",
  "gender": "unisex",
  "price": 117.50,
  "duration": 45,
  "tax_prcnt": 18.0,
  "status": "active",
  "productUsage": [
    {
      "productId": "{{product_id}}",
      "qty": 50,
      "unit": "ml"
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Create a new service with optional product usage. The service can define which products are consumed during the service.
Update an existing service. Can update service details and/or product usage. Only provided fields will be updated.
Delete a specific service and all associated product usage. Only store owners and managers can delete services.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Health Consultation",
  "reminder": 7,
  "category": "medical",
  "description": "General health consultation with basic examination",
  "gender": "unisex",
  "price": 250.00,
  "duration": 30,
  "tax_prcnt": 5.0,
  "status": "active",
  "productUsage": [
    {
      "productId": "{{product_id}}",
      "qty": 1,
      "unit": "piece"
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Example of creating a medical service with reminder and product usage.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Facial Treatment",
  "reminder": null,
  "category": "beauty",
  "description": "Rejuvenating facial treatment for glowing skin",
  "gender": "female",
  "price": 150.00,
  "duration": 60,
  "tax_prcnt": 18.0,
  "status": "active",
  "productUsage": [
    {
      "productId": "{{product_id}}",
      "qty": 30,
      "unit": "ml"
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Example of creating a beauty service for female customers with product consumption.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Seasonal Service",
  "reminder": null,
  "category": "special",
  "description": "Service only available during specific seasons",
  "gender": "unisex",
  "price": 200.00,
  "duration": 90,
  "tax_prcnt": 18.0,
  "status": "inactive",
  "productUsage": []
}

request.description: Example of creating an inactive service that can be activated later.
Example of updating only the service status to deactivate a service.

item.description: APIs for managing services with product usage tracking. Services can define which products are consumed during service delivery.

item.name: Membership Management

request.description: Retrieve all memberships for a specific store with pagination, search, and filtering options.
Retrieve details of a specific membership including all discounts, service packages, and loyalty points configuration.
Create a new premium membership with comprehensive benefits including discounts, service packages, and loyalty points.
Create a basic membership with simple benefits and universal service discounts.
Update an existing membership. Can update any field including discounts, validity, and loyalty points.
Update only the membership status to activate or deactivate a membership plan.
Delete a membership plan and all associated configurations. Only store owners can delete memberships.

item.description: APIs for managing store membership plans with complex discount structures, service packages, loyalty points, and validity periods.

item.name: Service Packages Management

request.description: Retrieve all service packages for a specific store with pagination, search, and filtering options.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific service package including all included services.
Create a new service package with bundled services and pricing configuration.
Update an existing service package's details, pricing, and service configuration.
Delete a service package and all associated service configurations. Only store owners can delete service packages.

item.description: APIs for managing service packages with bundled services, flexible pricing models, and validity periods. Supports both included services and discounted services within packages.

item.name: Loyalty Points Configuration

request.description: Retrieve the loyalty points configuration for a specific store.
Create a new loyalty points configuration for a store.
Update the loyalty points configuration for a store. All fields are optional.
Delete the loyalty points configuration for a store. Only store owners can delete configuration.

item.description: APIs for managing store-specific loyalty points configuration including conversion rates and points awarded for different transaction types.

item.name: Coupons Management

request.description: Retrieve all coupons for a specific store with pagination, search, and filtering options.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific coupon including all inclusions.
Create a new coupon with discount rules and inclusion conditions.
Update an existing coupon's details and conditions. All fields are optional.
Delete a coupon and all associated inclusions. Only store owners can delete coupons.
Validate a coupon for a specific order and calculate discount amount.

item.description: APIs for managing store coupons with flexible discount rules, validity periods, usage limits, and inclusion/exclusion conditions for services, products, and memberships.

item.name: File Upload APIs

request.description: Upload a single file (images: JPEG, PNG, GIF; documents: PDF). Max size: 5MB.
Upload multiple files (up to 10 files). Same file restrictions as single upload.
Delete a file from S3 storage using its filename/key.

item.description: File upload and management APIs for S3 storage

item.name: Customer Management APIs

request.description: Retrieve all customers for a store with pagination, search, and filtering options.
Get a specific customer by ID with all associated memberships and service packages.
Create a new customer for the store.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "John Smith Updated",
  "gender": "male",
  "birthday": "15/08",
  "anniversary": "22/12",
  "address": "456 Updated Street, New City, State 67890"
}

request.description: Update customer information.
Soft delete a customer (sets status to inactive).
Add or deduct loyalty points from customer account.
Add or deduct money from customer wallet balance.
Add or deduct customer dues.
Purchase a membership for a customer.
Purchase a service package for a customer.

item.description: Customer management APIs including CRUD operations, financial adjustments, and membership/package purchases

item.name: Reviews APIs

body.raw:
{
    "storeId": "{{store_id}}",
    "referringId": "customer123",
    "staffRating": 4,
    "hospitalityRating": 5,
    "serviceRating": 3,
    "review": "Had a fantastic experience at this store. Staff was very helpful and professional."
}

request.description: Create a new review for a store. This is a public API with rate limiting. Each referringId can only submit one review per store.
Get all reviews for a specific store with pagination and filtering. This is a public API with rate limiting.

Get review statistics for a store including store_id, overall_rating, total_reviews, and star distribution (five_stars, four_stars, three_stars, two_stars, one_stars). This is a public API with rate limiting.

body.raw:
{
    "storeId": "{{store_id}}",
    "referringId": "customer123",
    "staffRating": 3,
    "hospitalityRating": 4,
    "serviceRating": 5,
    "review": "Trying to submit another review with same referringId"
}

request.description: Test creating a duplicate review with the same referringId to verify the duplicate prevention logic works.

item.description: Public review APIs for store ratings and feedback. All endpoints have rate limiting and no authentication required.

item.name: Staff Management APIs

request.description: Create a new staff member with complete profile including salary, commission structure, shifts, and banking details. Creates user account in active state. Only owners and managers can create staff.
Retrieve all staff members for a store with pagination and status filtering.
Get detailed information about a specific staff member including salary, commission, and user status.
Update staff member details including salary, commission, shifts, banking details, and other information. Only owners and managers can update staff.
Update only the staff member's status (active, inactive, terminated).
Update only the banking details of a staff member including account number, IFSC code, banking name, and bank name.
Create a staff member with minimal required information (no commission structure).
Create a staff member with complete profile including banking details for salary transfers.
Get comprehensive staff statistics including total staff, active/inactive counts, designations, and roles.

item.description: APIs for managing staff members including creation, updating, role management, salary structures, and commission configurations. Each staff member gets a user account and can later set password via OTP verification.

item.name: Staff Payments APIs

request.description: Create a new staff payment with detailed breakdown of earnings and deductions. The payment period must be unique for each staff member.
Retrieve all staff payments with filtering, pagination, and sorting options.
Get a specific staff payment by ID with full breakdown details.
Update a staff payment record. Only pending payments can be updated.
Update the status of a staff payment (pending  processed  completed or failed). Include transaction ID for processed payments.
Delete a staff payment record. Only pending payments can be deleted.

item.description: APIs for managing staff payments including salary processing, commission calculations, and payment breakdowns. Supports detailed earnings and deductions tracking with status management.

item.name: Expense Management APIs

request.description: Retrieve all expenses for a store with pagination, filtering, and summary statistics.
Get a specific expense by ID with employee and approver details.

body.raw:
{
    "expenseName": "Office Supplies",
    "date": "2025-12-17",
    "employee_id": "{{user_id}}",
    "category": "Supplies",
    "amount": 145.30,
    "paymentMethod": "Credit Card",
    "description": "Purchased office supplies for the store",
    "receipt_id": "receipt_abc123.jpg"
}

request.description: Create a new expense record for a store employee.
Update an existing expense. Employees can only update their own expenses.
Delete an expense. Employees can only delete their own expenses.
Approve or reject an expense. Only managers and owners can approve expenses.
Reject an expense with comments. Only managers and owners can reject expenses.
Get comprehensive expense statistics including overview, category breakdown, and monthly trends.

item.description: Expense management APIs for tracking employee expenses, receipts, and approval workflows

request.description: Create a new appointment for a store. Status allowed: scheduled, in-progress, completed, cancelled.
List appointments for a store with optional date/status filters and pagination.
Get a single appointment by ID.
Update an existing appointment including status, time, and services.
